entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23 except 13 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower late this afternoon. High 23 except 13 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 14. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
